name: The Snug
address: 302 City Island Ave, Bronx, NY 10464, USA

reviews.text: Best bar in city island drinks are reasonable and food perfect
This place is so much fun!

A small pub with all the good feels dont go there looking for a good Teqiula , but to have a conversation. Buy a pint for a stranger or if your really lucky to meet an incredlible beautiful soul and Dog walker.
My go to spot when visiting city island! Friendly service and great drinks!
Good food, cute old bar with nice folks behind the stick!
Excellent Chicken Caesar Salad! And Cheeseburgers and Fries! Great selection of Beers, too.

Shepherd‚Äôs pie without a crust, $20 for mashed potatoes over a layer of hamburger meat w/ pea and carrots. (charged me $2 for asking for bread)
Atmosphere : the Beer maid is dating a 55 yo, father has Cancer and mother is vague but seems to be contentious‚Ä¶.  A lot of old people just walking in and out I wanted to enjoy it given all the Pride Flags but I was really disappointed and if I went back to Ireland and told them about this dish called Shepherds Pie in America they would die of a heart attack
Got the hot diggity dogs and it's been forever since I had a hot dog and all is I have to say is get in here they are off the charts
Great cozy spot
We arrived early for dinner. Service was quick. The food was tasty, and  portions were large. I had enough for lunch the next day.
fave hangout
Great cozy pub to enjoy on a rainy afternoon! Very attentive staff, clean bathroom, excellent food and good sized menu.
It was a good place for lunch. The food was good and it was a welcoming atmosphere. The drinks was also satisfying. Will definitely back when I'm in the area.

Always so warm and welcoming. The bartenders are great, Alex is ny favorite! She is very attentive and always makes sure you are taken care of. I had the pleasure of meeting the Owner and she was lovely as well. Huge staple for City Island and grateful it is here ‚ù§Ô∏è üíô üíú‚Ä¶

Nice local joint that has a cozy feeling.
Feels like a tavern in Ireland üáÆüá™.  Food was very fresh with generous portions. Place was clean with good service.‚Ä¶
Food is okay. I expected it to be a bit spicer. I had the garlic butter wings.
Great meal in the Pub! Fish/Chips and Egg Salad Sandwich. Great environment and welcoming staff.
Favorite hangout on city island
Enjoy drink here every time I'm in city Island üçª‚Ä¶

What a great actual bar. We stopped in while killing some time before a family event, and im actually just upset its not near my house. It's a very cozy but very friendly bar. Makes me want to come back to city island for sure

Today was our first time visiting City Island for a family event. We decided to get to the island early and were in desperate need of a snack. We stumbled across The Snug and were super satisfied. The Snug is so adorable with nice quick‚Ä¶
Bartenders very good. We only had apps.. but on point .
Good bar food good atmosphere,  cozy,they make a great drink and have cold drafts.
Friendly place with evening version of fare from City Island Diner next door
Excellent servers and ambiance.
Love them!!!!! Wouldn‚Äôt go anywhere else best owners in the world!!!!
Very good ....
Pleasantly surprised with The Snug. Good food and environment. Mike was an excellent host and was very friendly. Our Family will be back!
I love it here so friendly and good service ‚ù§
Too greasy

Great food! Love this atmosphere. Live entertainment and bartender was really connecting with people. Fast service. What else could you went from a neighborhood place. More than exceeds expectations. Get here would ya.
Great local place on City Island, the food is always very good, reasonably priced and the service is great. Highly recommended.
Always awesome.  Will miss this place.
Very good fresh food cost of food descent
The Best burgers
It's perfectly named.

Came with company on Sunday to have nice dinner and we were extremely disappointed: clam chowder soup was the worst in my life and from can;  oreganata clams - horrible,  potatoes - just ok. We ate crackers and left to other place for food. Never again !!!!!
Nice chill atmosphere....great service.üëçüèΩ‚Ä¶
Great food excellent service.   I true landmark of City Island
The snug was awesome. Local bar for residents type of feel with cozy atmosphere.
Very nice atmosphere nice place to have a drink and dine.
I really enjoyed my meal in a nice quiet environment. Can't wait to come back with my girl!
James the owner is super welcoming and friendly. The ambience is awesome, you can talk, listen music and have a good time, all under the right price.
Half priced burger Tuesdays at a great spot for food and drinks!!!
Great place. Try the shepards pie.
Great place cold beverages and delicious food... highly recommend it... people are very friendly...
Great place!
The snug is a great place for great food , drinks and service. Great casual spot for all kinds of things from finger foods, sandwiches and home made entrees. Service is fantastic!!
Love the Snug- the atmosphere, bar people, Owner& Family...we make a quarterly trip out here every year! Oh, and the food & drinks rock ~ üçª‚òòÔ∏è‚Ä¶
Awsome food very respectful and easy to make friends their
Love this joint! Great local vibe. Friendly staff and patrons.
Good food, good beer & friendly service, street parking
Great ambience and great, full menu! Fish and chips are exceptional!
Awesome spot..great food, very reasonable!
Great fish and chips in a cozy neighborhood spot.
Comfort food, good company, and a homely atmosphere.
A classy place, where once you are only a stranger once ...and then not for long ...
Great little bar conected to their diner
Great place! Nice and cozy.
